(Yes, Koga Shuko is not at the Ark anymore...and Hot Rod, there IS a cease 
fire between Koga Shuko's men and the Maximals)

Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:


Imprisoner and Predator dropped their weapons.  All three bounty hunters, 
arms up in the air, did as Rex, Firearm, and Bronco told them.

"I hardly think two Maximals is countless...well, then again, you do look 
pretty stupid," Predator said, referring to Bronco and his comment, "and it 
wasn't murder.  It was a battle.  Which your people caused!"

Imprisoner and Choran were still chuckling at Predator's first comment, 
continuing to walk.
